about_the_game:
A whimsical RPG adventure where a loving couple must vanquish the four Elemental Demon Lords! There's just one problem- the girlfriend is lusted after by the denizens of this realm, and the boyfriend has a huge cuckold fetish!


Open-Ended Sandbox World

Defeat the four Elemental Demon Lords in whichever order you choose, interacting with NPCs and learning more about the world as you go. After you defeat each boss, you can encourage Sunny, your girlfriend, to become increasingly "friendly" with the residents of this world!

Non-Linear Progression

Combat itself features equipment-based character power, there is no need to worry about grinding for experience points. It's much more important to explore the world, discovering hidden treasures and completing quests.

  • - Smorgasbord of Art: Over 500 illustrations spanning a wide range of fetishes and kinks!

  • - Additional Party Members: featuring unique "interactions" with you or your girlfriend

  • - Bi-curious? Influence Tommy's sexuality, unlocking gay and bisexual scenes!

  • - No Bad Endings! Love will always prevail, but love can take many strange forms

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains explicit depictions of sex. Such content includes cuckoldry, gay & lesbian pairings, BDSM dynamics, sex with monsters/anthropomorphic animals, watersports, humiliation, and corruption.

Additionally there are mild instances of sexual violence such as slapping, choking, hair pulling, and the like.

  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
